name: STAR Recruitment
tag_list: australian-talent-agency, modeling-jobs-australia, modeling-courses, media-jobs, acting-auditions-in-australia, acting-jobs-australia
description: STAR Recruitment is a reliable and ethic
overview:
Established in early 2003, Hicrobe Pty. Ltd. Trading as Specialized Training And Recruitment STAR is the only recruitment induction, training, career and resource institution of its kind in Australia and New Zealand. STAR was born out of the desire to create a bridge between candidates that possess the drive to forge a career in media, entertainment, promotions, and modelling and firms seeking industry-trained, passionate, motivated team members who have the knowledge necessary to hit the ground running.

As a testament to our brand, STAR’s products and services now range from acting courses, modelling and deportment courses on-site recruitment training, corporate recruitment and training. Whether you’re a trainee, experienced actor, model, or just looking to earn some extra money working as an extra our coordinators will provide you with the best source of information available to you.

You will require energy, enthusiasm, professionalism, competitiveness, drive and a strong desire to advance – no wonder it is an appealing, challenging and lucrative industry. STAR is Australia’s most reliable and ethical talent agency for modelling work in film and TV.

Our people benefit by getting extras work, acting roles, featured roles, bit parts, catalog and photography work.
